title: eCommerce website - MERN Fullstack
subtitle: React, Redux, Mongo, Node, Express
description: Developed with the MERN stack + Redux for the state management, this is a fully functional e-commerce website including pages from product listing to payment and admin area with CRUD functionality for users, products and orders. Authentication handled with JWT.

title: Portfolio-Blog website
subtitle: React, Next.js, Markdown
description: Developed with Next.js using Static Site Generation. Dynamic pages for projects and blog posts. Blog posts written in markdown and rendered with react-markdown.

title: eCommerce website - Next.js and Typescript
subtitle: React, Typescript, Next.js, Mongo, Node, Express, Contentful

title: Shopware
subtitle: Shopware 5 & 6, Bootstrap 3 & 4, Twig, Smarty
description: Worked on the development of Shopware 6 itself and many other Shopware 5 and 6 projects.

title: Blog
subtitle: React, Next.js, Mongodb
description: Blog posts written in markdown and rendered with "react-markdown". Notifications displayed via react portal through "_document.js.". Contact form using mongodb.

title: Next.js authentication using next-auth
subtitle: React, Next.js
description: Project built using next-auth library to handle authentication. SessionProvider, useSession, getSession, CredentialsProvider, JWT & bcryptjs (for password hashing), mongodb, HTTP requests sent using fetch.

title: Contact Keeper - MERN Fullstack
subtitle: React, Mongo, Node, Express
description: This is a MERN Fullstack project with authentication and CRUD functionality.

title: Message Logger App - MERN Fullstack
subtitle: React, Redux, Mongo, Node, Express
description: This is a MERN + Redux project with authentication and CRUD functionality. Functionalities: Add/delete logs & users; list logs/users

title: Resort website with room listing and filtering
subtitle: React, Contentful
description: Simple resort website with room listing and filter settings. Used react context API for state management and Contentful for content (image, text) delivery.
